description: Impress dinner guests with this mini lemon tart recipe. Learn how to make the pastry, the filling and the meringue all from scratch.
keywords: Mini Lemon Tarts With Meringue Caps
name: Mini Lemon Tarts With Meringue Caps Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Fill cooled pastry cases with lemon curd. Spoon meringue on top and brown using a kitchen blow torch. Serve.
